definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Mordo takes his power and says there's too many sorcerers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 莫度夺走了潘伯恩的法力，说世界上的魔法师太多了。

sentences.english: Based on a king Arthur and the sorcerers story.
sentences.chinese: 本剧根据亚瑟王与魔法师梅林的故事改编。

sentences.english: He was a magician 10 from Morocco, and he wanted this lamp very much.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个来自摩洛哥的魔法师，他非常想得到那盏灯。

sentences.english: The King flared up. He wanted the prime minister left and called the palace wizard.
sentences.chinese: 国王大发雷霆，要总理大臣离开，把宫廷魔法师找来。

sentences.english: The children were attracted by the stories of the enchanter.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们被魔法师的故事吸引住了。

sentences.english: So we're kind of meta-magicians, you might say.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你可能会说我们有点象魔法师。

sentences.english: He always tells the children the stories of the enchanter.
sentences.chinese: 他经常给孩子们讲魔法师的故事。

sentences.english: Beholder mages do not require material components to cast their spells.
sentences.chinese: 眼魔法师不需要材料成分就能施展它们的法术。

sentences.english: The palace wizard was thin and tinny, and he had a long face.
sentences.chinese: 宫廷魔法师长的又瘦又小，还有一张长长的脸。

sentences.english: You are an Illusionist and somewhat telepathic.
sentences.chinese: 你是一个魔法师并且小有心灵感应术。

sentences.english: The verbal component of a beholder mage's spells is the creature's special spellcasting song.
sentences.chinese: 需要言语成分的法术，眼魔法师会吟唱特殊的法歌。

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon jokingly makes a stab at a connection between magic carpets and wizards.
sentences.chinese: 弗农姨父挖苦式地试图在飞毯和魔法师之间建立联系。

sentences.english: We looked at the conjurer in silent conjurer.
sentences.chinese: 我们不作声惊讶地看着那魔法师。

sentences.english: It was a magician who played magic.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个会施魔法的魔法师。

definition: blood relations/one's own flesh and blood/kin
